subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV FILES
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_006E_01C9D3A1.E0469FD0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

This type of file sharing is new to me. I have a photo album site for shari=
ng and uploading photos, but you can't upload files. I didn't know there we=
re file sharing sites until joined this group, but I had always thought the=
re should be.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Misty 
  To: EVP-ITC=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, May 13, 2009 12:58 AM
  Subject: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: File uploading rules DO NOT UPLOAD WAV FILES





  LOL Snowfire! =
Nope it was not you this time. Others should read before they post because =
we just addressed this subject. Esnips is very easy to use it has two uploa=
ding options in case you cant use the java application use the single file =
uploader. Works alot like email upload attachments.

  If you need more hel=
p just holler and I am sure one of us will be more than willing to help you=
 figure it out. Posting from email as an attachment also works just not so =
well for the very large file sizes. There are many other file sharing stora=
ge places besides esnips. We just like the layout there and the ability to =
share with friends including sharing storage space.

  Misty

  --- In EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
  >
  > Well, it is not me, I too=
k out the folder, and I removed the files, I can't 
  > figure out esnips, =
it says it will take lots of files at once but, it 
  > never sends a conne=
ction, to upload anything.
  > 
  > 
  > In a message dated 5/13/2009 2:45:=
10 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, 
  > bulletbabea@... writes:
  > 
  > 
  > 
=
  > 
  > 
  > Ok I am getting tired of having to say this especially twice =
in a couple 
  > days. Do not upload wav format files if you feel you must =
share it in wav 
  > format then use esnips or another file sharing source.=
 If newbies cant follow 
  > the groups rules then you will not be allowed =
to upload files period. 
  > 
  > Everything will be deleted and you may re=
upload in proper formats and 
  > remember to respect the fact that this gr=
oup of over 500 people has a limited 
  > amoyunt of file sharing space on =
yahoo. Only 100 megs split between 
  > everyone. that is why we work to ge=
t around our limitations by attaching files to 
  > posts via email attachm=
ent or using _http://www.esnips.htt_ 
  > (http://www.esnips.com/) etcetera=
.
  > 
  > Misty
